name: QuirkyPivotPowerSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on pivot power smart”
”Alexa, turn off pivot power smart”
”Alexa, turn on plug one”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Amazon Echo integration for the Quirky Pivot Power Smart App: Allows users to control the wifi app controlled smart power strip with Alexa voice commands. This automatically syncs the device to the Amazon Echo functions.

Requirements:
- Quirky Pivot Power Smart App for Android or Apple Devices
- A connected Quirky Pivot Power Smart Power Strip
- Home or Office Secure Wifi Connection
